# JsonPatch.ByteCountSaved property

The approximate number of bytes saved by the patch.

```csharp
public int? ByteCountSaved { get; }
```

## Property Value

The approximate number of bytes saved by the patch. Null if unknown.

## Remarks

If negative, the JSON of the patch uses more bytes than the JSON of the result of the patch.
